mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAST (F_NO, F_ID, F_ELAPSEDTIME, F_START, F_END) VALUES (10, 89, #{elapsedTime}, TO_DATE(#{confirmStartTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{confirmEndTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select F_ELAPSEDTIME AS elapsedTime , F_START AS ConfirmStartTime ,F_END AS ConfirmEndTime from FAST
